/usr/local/cuda-11/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -ccbin=/opt/rh/devtoolset-10/root/usr/bin/gcc -gencode=arch=compute_75,code=[sm_75,compute_75] -O3 -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/testCUDA.dir/src/graphic.cpp.o CMakeFiles/testCUDA.dir/src/main.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/testCUDA.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-11/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  libcore.a  -ldl -lpthread -lmpi -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lstdc++ -lgcc_s -lgcc
